00058 int ED_space_clip_poll(bContext *C)
00059 {
00060     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00061 
00062     if (sc && sc->clip)
00063         return TRUE;
00064 
00065     return FALSE;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void ED_space_clip_set(bContext *C, SpaceClip *sc, MovieClip *clip)
00069 {
00070     sc->clip = clip;
00071 
00072     if (sc->clip && sc->clip->id.us==0)
00073         sc->clip->id.us = 1;
00074 
00075     if (C)
00076         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_SELECTED, sc->clip);
00077 }

00079 MovieClip *ED_space_clip(SpaceClip *sc)
00080 {
00081     return sc->clip;
00082 }
00083 
00084 ImBuf *ED_space_clip_get_buffer(SpaceClip *sc)
00085 {
00086     if (sc->clip) {
00087         ImBuf *ibuf;
00088 
00089         ibuf = BKE_movieclip_get_postprocessed_ibuf(sc->clip, &sc->user, sc->postproc_flag);
00090 
00091         if (ibuf && (ibuf->rect || ibuf->rect_float))
00092             return ibuf;
00093 
00094         if (ibuf)
00095             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00096     }
00097 
00098     return NULL;
00099 }
00100 
00101 ImBuf *ED_space_clip_get_stable_buffer(SpaceClip *sc, float loc[2], float *scale, float *angle)
00102 {
00103     if (sc->clip) {
00104         ImBuf *ibuf;
00105 
00106         ibuf = BKE_movieclip_get_stable_ibuf(sc->clip, &sc->user, loc, scale, angle, sc->postproc_flag);
00107 
00108         if (ibuf && (ibuf->rect || ibuf->rect_float))
00109             return ibuf;
00110 
00111         if (ibuf)
00112             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00113     }
00114 
00115     return NULL;
00116 }

00118 void ED_space_clip_size(SpaceClip *sc, int *width, int *height)
00119 {
00120     if (!sc->clip) {
00121         *width = *height = 0;
00122     }
00123     else {
00124         BKE_movieclip_get_size(sc->clip, &sc->user, width, height);
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 void ED_space_clip_zoom(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, float *zoomx, float *zoomy)
00129 {
00130     int width, height;
00131 
00132     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00133 
00134     *zoomx = (float)(ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1)/(float)((ar->v2d.cur.xmax - ar->v2d.cur.xmin)*width);
00135     *zoomy = (float)(ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin + 1)/(float)((ar->v2d.cur.ymax - ar->v2d.cur.ymin)*height);
00136 }
00137 
00138 void ED_space_clip_aspect(SpaceClip *sc, float *aspx, float *aspy)
00139 {
00140     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00141 
00142     if (clip)
00143         BKE_movieclip_aspect(clip, aspx, aspy);
00144     else
00145         *aspx = *aspy = 1.0f;
00146 }

00148 void ED_clip_update_frame(const Main *mainp, int cfra)
00149 {
00150     wmWindowManager *wm;
00151     wmWindow *win;
00152 
00153     /* image window, compo node users */
00154     for (wm = mainp->wm.first; wm; wm = wm->id.next) { /* only 1 wm */
00155         for (win = wm->windows.first; win; win = win->next) {
00156             ScrArea *sa;
00157 
00158             for (sa = win->screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00159                 if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_CLIP) {
00160                     SpaceClip *sc = sa->spacedata.first;
00161 
00162                     sc->scopes.ok = FALSE;
00163 
00164                     BKE_movieclip_user_set_frame(&sc->user, cfra);
00165                 }
00166             }
00167         }
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 static int selected_boundbox(SpaceClip *sc, float min[2], float max[2])
00172 {
00173     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00174     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00175     int width, height, ok = FALSE;
00176     ListBase *tracksbase= BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
00177 
00178     INIT_MINMAX2(min, max);
00179 
00180     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00181 
00182     track = tracksbase->first;
00183     while (track) {
00184         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)) {
00185             MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00186 
00187             if (marker) {
00188                 float pos[3];
00189 
00190                 pos[0] = marker->pos[0] + track->offset[0];
00191                 pos[1] = marker->pos[1] + track->offset[1];
00192                 pos[2] = 0.0f;
00193 
00194                 /* undistortion happens for normalized coords */
00195                 if (sc->user.render_flag & MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_UNDISTORT) {
00196                     /* undistortion happens for normalized coords */
00197                     ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(sc, pos, pos);
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 pos[0] *= width;
00201                 pos[1] *= height;
00202 
00203                 mul_v3_m4v3(pos, sc->stabmat, pos);
00204 
00205                 DO_MINMAX2(pos, min, max);
00206 
00207                 ok = TRUE;
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00211         track = track->next;
00212     }
00213 
00214     return ok;
00215 }
00216 
00217 int ED_clip_view_selection(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, int fit)
00218 {
00219     int w, h, frame_width, frame_height;
00220     float min[2], max[2];
00221 
00222     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &frame_width, &frame_height);
00223 
00224     if (frame_width == 0 || frame_height == 0)
00225         return FALSE;
00226 
00227     if (!selected_boundbox(sc, min, max))
00228         return FALSE;
00229 
00230     /* center view */
00231     clip_view_center_to_point(sc, (max[0]+min[0])/(2*frame_width), (max[1]+min[1])/(2*frame_height));
00232 
00233     w = max[0] - min[0];
00234     h = max[1] - min[1];
00235 
00236     /* set zoom to see all selection */
00237     if (w > 0 && h > 0) {
00238         int width, height;
00239         float zoomx, zoomy, newzoom, aspx, aspy;
00240 
00241         ED_space_clip_aspect(sc, &aspx, &aspy);
00242 
00243         width = ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1;
00244         height = ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin + 1;
00245 
00246         zoomx = (float)width / w / aspx;
00247         zoomy = (float)height / h / aspy;
00248 
00249         newzoom = 1.0f / power_of_2(1.0f / MIN2(zoomx, zoomy));
00250 
00251         if (fit || sc->zoom>newzoom)
00252             sc->zoom = newzoom;
00253     }
00254 
00255     return TRUE;
00256 }
00257 
00258 void ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(SpaceClip *sc, float co[2], float nco[2])
00259 {
00260     copy_v2_v2(nco, co);
00261 
00262     if (sc->user.render_flag & MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_UNDISTORT) {
00263         MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00264         float aspy = 1.0f / clip->tracking.camera.pixel_aspect;
00265         int width, height;
00266 
00267         ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00268 
00269         nco[0] *= width;
00270         nco[1] *= height * aspy;
00271 
00272         BKE_tracking_invert_intrinsics(&clip->tracking, nco, nco);
00273 
00274         nco[0] /= width;
00275         nco[1] /= height * aspy;
00276     }
00277 }
00278 
00279 void ED_clip_point_stable_pos(bContext *C, float x, float y, float *xr, float *yr)
00280 {
00281     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00282     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00283     int sx, sy, width, height;
00284     float zoomx, zoomy, pos[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, imat[4][4];
00285 
00286     ED_space_clip_zoom(sc, ar, &zoomx, &zoomy);
00287     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00288 
00289     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, 0.0f, 0.0f, &sx, &sy);
00290 
00291     pos[0] = (x - sx) / zoomx;
00292     pos[1] = (y - sy) / zoomy;
00293 
00294     invert_m4_m4(imat, sc->stabmat);
00295     mul_v3_m4v3(pos, imat, pos);
00296 
00297     *xr = pos[0] / width;
00298     *yr = pos[1] / height;
00299 
00300     if (sc->user.render_flag & MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_UNDISTORT) {
00301         MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00302         MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00303         float aspy = 1.0f / tracking->camera.pixel_aspect;
00304         float tmp[2] = {*xr * width, *yr * height * aspy};
00305 
00306         BKE_tracking_apply_intrinsics(tracking, tmp, tmp);
00307 
00308         *xr = tmp[0] / width;
00309         *yr = tmp[1] / (height * aspy);
00310     }
00311 }
00312 
00313 void ED_clip_mouse_pos(bContext *C, wmEvent *event, float co[2])
00314 {
00315     ED_clip_point_stable_pos(C, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &co[0], &co[1]);
00316 }
